Advance.NAME: Advance
Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, NL draw 1 less cards.

Barrier.NAME: Barrier
Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [B] [B] [B]. NL Next turn, draw NL 5 less cards and NL lose [B] [B] [B]. NL Exhaust.

Comet.NAME: Comet
Comet.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! more cards.

CosmicInflation.NAME: Cosmic Inflation
CosmicInflation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

DWeaponry.NAME: D. Weaponry
DWeaponry.DESCRIPTION: At the start NL of your turn, NL obtain !M! Knives.

Deny.NAME: Deny
Deny.DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to 4 cards. NL Exhaust.
Deny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Look at your draw pile. NL You may discard up to 4 cards.

DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to both the enemy and yourself.

Duplication.NAME: Duplication
Duplication.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and Frail to you. NL This turn, your next !M! card(s) is played twice.

Enbodiment.NAME: Enbodiment
Enbodiment.DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, add a random Temporal card to your draw pile.

Exchange.NAME: Exchange
Exchange.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each stack of Debuffs on you.

FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan Of Knives
FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Throw X multiply NL by !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy.

Farseeing.NAME: Farseeing
Farseeing.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL draw !M! more cards NL and gain [B].

FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
FastForward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the duration of Debuffs on you NL for 1 turn.

FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Next turn, lose [B].

FlawlessForm.NAME: Flawless Form
FlawlessForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifacts. NL Draw one less card each turn for this combat.

FloweringNight.NAME: Flowering Night
FloweringNight.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card(s) whenever you play a card this turn. NL Exhaust.

FollowUp.NAME: FollowUp
FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Blight, gain [B] and draw a card.

FullDefense.NAME: Full Defense
FullDefense.DESCRIPTION: Spend all [B]. NL Gain !B! Block NL X time(s). NL Apply X Weak to you.

FullOffense.NAME: Full Offense
FullOffense.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage that equals to the number of cards in your hand. NL Discard your hand.

GarbageDisposal.NAME: Garbage Disposal
GarbageDisposal.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Gain Dexterity equals to the number of cards you just exhausted. NL Exhaust.

Gouge.NAME: Gouge
Gouge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Weakened, apply 1 Blight.

Haste.NAME: Haste
Haste.DESCRIPTION: Draw one more card next turn for each Skill card you played this turn. NL Ethereal.
Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw one more card next turn for each Skill card you played this turn.

Indiscriminate.NAME: Indiscriminate
Indiscriminate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL to ALL enemies. NL They lose !M! Strength for one turn.

KidneyShot.NAME: Kidney Shot
KidneyShot.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply 1 Weak.

KillerInstinct.NAME: Killer Instinct
KillerInstinct.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Dexterity if there are any Debuffs on you.

KillingDoll.NAME: Killing Doll
KillingDoll.DESCRIPTION: Throw ALL Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

Laundry.NAME: Laundry
Laundry.DESCRIPTION: Exhasut all Curse and Status in your draw pile and discard pile.
Laundry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhasut all Curse and Status in your draw pile and discard pile.

Misdirection.NAME: Misdirection
Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Blight to ALL enemies.

MoonPhase.NAME: Moon Phase
MoonPhase.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity and gain 1 Strength.

Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw 2 Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply 1 Blight. NL Ethereal.

MorningCall.NAME: Morning Call
MorningCall.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

MurderousAura.NAME: Murderous Aura
MurderousAura.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.
MurderousAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

NoEscape.NAME: No Escape
NoEscape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

Unparalleled.NAME: Unparalleled
Unparalleled.DESCRIPTION: If this is the only card that costs 2 in your deck, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

Potential.NAME: Potential
Potential.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded, its damage increases for !M! for this combat.

PullOut.NAME: Desolation
PullOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the enemy's Blight.

Read.NAME: Read
Read.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, if the enemy not intend to attack, apply !M! Blight. NL Can only read one enemy at a time.

RealityMarble.NAME: Reality Marble
RealityMarble.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL All cards lose Ethereal property for this combat.

Rearm.NAME: Rearm
Rearm.DESCRIPTION: Obtain 6 Knives. NL Gain !M! Strength for this turn.

Replace.NAME: Replace
Replace.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card from your draw pile. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Reset.NAME: Reset
Reset.DESCRIPTION: Clear ALL NL Debuffs on you. NL Exhaust.
Reset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Clear ALL NL Debuffs on you.

ReturningBlades.NAME: Returning Blades
ReturningBlades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Attack card in your discard pile.

Revamp.NAME: Revamp
Revamp.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of NL your cards into NL your draw pile. NL Next turn, draw 2 more cards. NL Exhaust.
Revamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of NL your cards into NL your draw pile. NL Next turn, draw 2 more cards.

Rewind.NAME: Rewind
Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

Sabotage.NAME: Sabotage
Sabotage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength for one turn. NL Exhaust.

ShiftingGears.NAME: Shifting Gears
ShiftingGears.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If this card is discarded, gain !M! Dexterity.

ShiftingReality.NAME: Shifting Reality
ShiftingReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded, deal !M! Static Damage NL to ALL enemies.

ShiftingThoughts.NAME: Shifting Thoughts
ShiftingThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top card of your draw pile. NL If this card is discarded, draw !M! cards.

SilverBlades.NAME: Silver Blades
SilverBlades.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards that Throw Knives for the rest of this combat.
SilverBlades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Upgrade ALL cards that Throw Knives for the rest of this combat.

Snipe.NAME: Snipe
Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Throw a Knife. NL Deal !D! damage.

SoulSculpture.NAME: Soul Sculpture
SoulSculpture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL six times. NL Enemy loses NL !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Spin.NAME: Spin
Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

StarChef.NAME: Star Chef
StarChef.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust and card and thereby gain [B].
StarChef.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, you may exhaust and card and thereby gain [B].

Starlight.NAME: Starlight
Starlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw 4 Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Ethereal.

StressReliever.NAME: Stress Reliever
StressReliever.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, look at the NL top !M! cards of NL your draw pile. NL You may discard NL any of them.

Sunlight.NAME: Sunlight
Sunlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw a Knife. NL Deals !D! damage NL to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal.

SurpressingFire.NAME: Surpressing Fire
SurpressingFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Knife you Throw.

Taunt.NAME: Taunt
Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gain !M! Strength. NL You gain !M! [B] next turn.

TemporalArms.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, obtain 4 Knives and gain 10 Block. NL Ethereal.
TemporalArms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, obtain 4 Knives and gain 10 Block.

TemporalEssence.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, gain [B] and draw 2 cards. NL Ethereal.
TemporalEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, gain [B] and draw 2 cards.

TemporalMisd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

TemporalSlicing.NAME: Temporal Slicing
TemporalSlicing.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, deal 6 damage twice randomly. NL Ethereal.
TemporalSlicing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, deal 6 damage to a random enemy twice.

TheWorld.NAME: The World
TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next card costs 0.

TimeEmbedded.NAME: Time Embedded
TimeEmbedded.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose [B] next turn.

TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an emeny, place a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash To Treasure
TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! card(s) from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade them. NL Exhaust.

Unruled.NAME: Unruled
Unruled.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If there are any Debuffs on you, deal double damage.

Unsheathe.NAME: Unsheathe
Unsheathe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL three times. NL Apply 2 Weak and Frail to yourself.
